backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining competitions, payments, profiles, results, and authorization, including event comparison logic and data models.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding userPayments while preserving existing state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Static Razorpay config providing keyId, currency, branding, and theme settings.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Utility for normalizing backend error messages into user-friendly text.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key definitions for competitions, profiles, results, and payments.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup with routing, theming, query client, and profile setup handling.
Component that checks if the user is an allowlisted admin and displays a loading or access-denied screen before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout state and displays an appropriate button with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Gate component that requires user authentication, showing a login prompt or loading spinner before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Renders a clickable card showing competition details, status, and navigation to the competition page.
Main layout providing header, navigation, footer, and special handling for solve-flow pages with admin and auth UI logic.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Displays a leaderboard table with ranks, Ao5 calculation, attempt details, and optional profile display names.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Shows a user's payment history with loading/error states, sorting, and detailed card-style entries.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Profile dialog enabling viewing and editing user profile details, tabs for profile and payments, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog component that collects email and display name, sets user email, and creates a user profile via mutations.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Manages the 15‑second inspection timer with penalty logic, showing scramble and invoking completion with penalties.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Displays a completion message after all solves and provides navigation to leaderboard or back to competition.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Implements a solve timer with start/stop controls, tracking milliseconds and reporting final time.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay public configuration with caching and provides a fallback default config.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload listener to warn users about leaving when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor once available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling auth client creation, login, identity loading, and state management.
Blocks browser back navigation when enabled by prompting the user to confirm leaving.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating competition, user, payment, and result data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theme colors and layout.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Implements Ao5 calculation logic for five attempts and defines leaderboard entry types.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable dates using US locale.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay’s checkout script and opens the payment modal with configured options and handlers.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds.milliseconds strings and handles DNF values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Admin UI for creating competitions, collecting metadata, events, scrambles, and fees, then submitting via createCompetition API.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting a competition.
Fetches competitions and renders running, upcoming, and completed lists with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows competition leaderboard, fetching competition data, results, and public profiles for display.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages a full solve session with inspection, solving, submission, and attempt flow, using queries to load competition data and submit attempts.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event labels, full event list, and the default event used throughout the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and registering plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, architecture, features, and known issues for the speedcubing platform.
